comment:
* Listener to be notified when the set of controllable {@link WindowInsets.Type} controlled by * a {@link WindowInsetsController} changes. *

* Once a {@link WindowInsets.Type} becomes controllable, the app will be able to control the * window that is causing this type of insets by calling {@link #controlWindowInsetsAnimation}. *

* Note: When listening to controllability of the {@link Type#ime}, * {@link #controlWindowInsetsAnimation} may still fail in case the {@link InputMethodService} * decides to cancel the show request. This could happen when there is a hardware keyboard * attached. * * @see #addOnControllableInsetsChangedListener(OnControllableInsetsChangedListener) * @see #removeOnControllableInsetsChangedListener(OnControllableInsetsChangedListener)

methods.name: void onControllableInsetsChanged(@NonNull WindowInsetsController controller, @InsetsType int typeMask)
methods.comment:
* Called when the set of controllable {@link WindowInsets.Type} changes.
         *
         * @param controller The controller for which the set of controllable
         *                   {@link WindowInsets.Type}s are changing.
         * @param typeMask Bitwise type-mask of the {@link WindowInsets.Type}s the controller is
         *                 currently able to control.

methodNames: void onControllableInsetsChanged(@NonNull WindowInsetsController controller, @InsetsType int typeMask)
